## Transaction.removeStateChangeListener() method

Removes a listener previously registered with addStateListener.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeStateChangeListener(listener: () => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listener | <code>() =&gt; void</code> | Callback function. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
